discussion_comments.comment_body: More of a question than a feedback, but -- if we are planning on migrating away from rails-ujs over time, this creates slightly more work. If there's an easy/alternate way to set up the hooks, maybe do that? If not, fine as-is and we can migrate whenever other areas migrate (or never).
We have `reduceMotion` exported from `mastodon/initial_state` which is manually set in preferences. Probably we should use that since that's used everywhere else?
